other_tests.findings: Thrombosis of the left common iliac, internal and external iliac, and common femoral veins. No evidence of pulmonary embolism.
Numerous eosinophils, consistent with a hypersensitivity reaction.

other_tests.procedure_name: Punch biopsy of the left thigh
other_tests.findings: Septal panniculitis with fibrosis and an inflammatory infiltrate including lymphocytes, eosinophils, and histiocytes. Features consistent with eosinophilic fasciitis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Upon reexamination 14 months later, there was an increased density of spindle-shaped fibroblasts and thickened collagen bundles.
